titleStmt.title: Jati Mula (L 1097 Peti 69)
Digital Diplomatic Edition of Jati Mula (L 1097 Peti 69)

licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf (gebang) manuscript. 55 leaves in Western Old Javanese script with ink. Apparently written circa 1400 c.

history.p: This manuscript originates from Kabuyutan Koleang in Jasinga, Bogor, Indonesia. It was acquired by the Bataviaasch Genootschap van Kunsten en Wetenschappen (BGKW), along with other manuscripts from Jasinga. Subsequently, this collection was housed in the National Museum of Indonesia before being moved to the National Library of Indonesia, where it remains today.
